name: Leverage Digital

description:
Leverage Digital is an award-winning digital marketing agency that partners with brands to successfully engage their audiences and achieve measurable results. The agency is a Certified Google Partner, and its work has garnered numerous industry accolades over the years, receiving honors from the International Davey Awards, Hermes Awards, W3 Awards, and Communicator Awards to name a few.
In 2018, Leverage Digital was named the 9th fastest growing company owned or led by a University of South Florida alumnus.
